definitions.title: chest, ark
definitions.body: (Ph. [[ארן]], sarcophagus, As. êrênu (& êrû) chest Zim:BP 6, 22, Ar. 0irnanun, chest, so Aram. 0aruwno0, also Nab. [[ארנא]], Vog:p. 102, Ph.; Mish. also pl. [[ארונות]])—only sg.; abs. † [[אֲרוֹן]] 2Ki 12:10 = 2Ch 24:8; c. art. [[הָאָרוֹן]] De 10:2 + alw. exc. Ex Lv Nu where [[הָאָרׂן]] (Ex 25:14, Ex 25:14 + 13 t. Ex, Le 16:2, Nu 3:31, Nu 10:35); cstr. [[אֲרוֹן]]Ex 25:10 +, † [[אֲרׂן]] Ex 30:6, Nu 4:5, Nu 7:89—†

chest, ark in tabernacle & temple, containing tables of law, with cherubim above, the esp. seat of ´[[י]] among his people, only Hex (71 t.) S (61 t.) K (12 t.) & Ch (48 t.) + Ju Jdg 20:27, Je 3:16, Ps 132:8; used alone & in various combinations (cf. Seyring:ZAW 1891, 114 f.).

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: indef. [[אֲרוֹן עֲחֵי שִׁטִים]] an ark of shittim-wood Ex 25:10, De 10:3 cf. v:De 10:1.

definitions.title: g.
definitions.body: [[אֲרוֹן הָעֵדוּת]] ark of the testimony, only in P, corresponding to [[בְּרִית]] ´[[א]] (cf. Di on Ex 25:16), Ex 25:22 + 8 t. Ex, † Nu 4:5, Nu 7:84, Jos 4:16.

definitions.title: i.
definitions.body: [[עֻזֶּךָָ]] ´[[א]] the ark of thy strength 2Ch 6:41, Ps 132:8.—(Cf. also tables given by Seyring:1.c. & his theory as to earliest designation of ark.)
